# OBJECT::DOOR_SYSTEM_GET_AUTOMATIC_DISTANCE

## Summary
Get the distance threshold at which the (sliding/garage/barrier) door should open at, in meters

## Parameters
* **INT** doorEnumHash

## Returns
* **FLOAT**
